Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at abba Reino de Navarra Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Pamplona, steps from Yamaguchi Park and minutes from Pamplona Planetarium. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of University of Navarra and Ciudadela.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 88 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and supervised childcare/activities. Additional features include wedding services, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Pamplona? This hotel has facilities measuring 2335 square feet (217 square meters), including meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at abba Reino de Navarra Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Pamplona, steps from Yamaguchi Park and minutes from Pamplona Planetarium. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of University of Navarra and Ciudadela.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Yamaguchi Park - 0 km / 0 mi
Pamplona Planetarium - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
University of Navarra - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Ciudadela - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Parque de la Taconera - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Auditorio Baluarte - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Plaza Principe de Viana - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Pamplona City Hall - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Plaza del Castillo - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Plaza de Toros - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Pamplona Cathedral - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Public University of Navarre - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Estadio Reyno de Navarra - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
La Morea Shopping Center - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Bodega Otazu - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi

The preferred airport for abba Reino de Navarra Hotel is Pamplona (PNA) - 4.9 km / 3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
